title: Big Baby
description: Beware, ladies. There’s a man-sized baby on the loose, and he has an axe to grind.
altHero: a man in a pink jumper covered in blood wears a baby face mask holds an axe
alt1: two frightened young women huddle together in the dark
alt2: the man in the baby mask covered in blood
alt3: a blonde woman looks scared as the baby man is behind her
alt4: the frightened woman scrambling on the ground
